title: Voz
synopsis: Voz is designed to be a simple [[mutual credit]] based currency designed to facilitate and bootstrap our collaboration.

title: Welcome Visitors
synopsis: Here we research the design of currency tools for reciprocal exchange between cooperative and not-for-profit sectors. In this first iteration we have started to use and develop [[Voz]] as a three-layered currency design for the annual [[DarVoz]] event.
